messages_events_Send_Private_Message: I sent you a private message
messages_events_Failed_To_Send_Message: Failed to send message. Maybe I'm on your blacklist!
prefix_change_Must_have_Permission: You cannot change the prefix. You must have permission: `MANAGE SERVER`
language_change_Not_Admin: You are not Admin or you can't managed server
language_change_lang: You have changed the language of the bot to: `{0}`
giveaway_registry_Error:
The giveaway was canceled because the bot was unable to get the ID
your post for editing. Please try again. **Write us what exactly happened.
We are trying to fix this bug. Support guild:** https://discord.gg/UrWG3R683d
Game_Start:
Choose from two `SelectMenu` letter,
or use `/word`: if you already know the word.
Game_Start2:
Send one letter at a time to the chat,
or just the word.
Game_You_Use_This_Letter: You have already used this letter!
Game_You_Use_This_Word: You have already used this word!
Hangman_Listener_You_Play:
You're playing now.
To finish the game, click on the button
Hangman_Listener_Need_Set_Language:
First you need to set the language for the words and game mode.
This can be done by pressing on the button with the language and mode.
Then click on the Play button
MessageStats_Zero_Divide: You have `0` games, and we are not crazy!
ReactionsButton_Save: You have changed the language of the game to: `{0}`
ReactionsButton_When_Play:
During the game, you can not change the language
without completing the active one.
ModeButton_When_Play:
During the game, you can not change the mode
without completing the active one.
restore_Data:
I will sent you a private message with a confirmation code,
and you will see further instructions there.
restore_Data_PM:
To delete all your data that we store, write to the same chat:
`!delete {0}`
restore_Data_Success:
The code was successfully accepted.
Your data on the server has been successfully deleted.
restore_Data_Failure:
I can't find this code.
Try writing `!delete` again in the same chat!
errors:
Please try again in 5 seconds!
If the error persists, write here:
https://discord.gg/UrWG3R683d
slash_language:
You have successfully changed the languages to:
Game: `{0}` and Bot: `{1}`
timeIsOver:
You ran out of time, the game was completed.
We didn't count you a loss.
word_is_null:
The word that was, became null, we had to cancel the game. Start a new game
If the error repeats, write here: https://discord.gg/UrWG3R683d
wrongLength: The word cannot be longer or shorter than hidden word!
game_only_dm: You can only play DM (Use `/hg` in private messages with me).
